text:
Kailyn Lowry can’t get enough of that newborn smell. The Teen Mom 2 star revealed on Thursday, May 24, that she sees a fourth child in her future.

“I want one more,” the 26-year-old shared on her podcast Coffee Convos With Kail Lowry and Lindsie Chrisley.

Kailyn is open to having No. 4 on her own, but she wants her next pregnancy to be with fellow Teen Mom 2 star Chelsea Houska, who appeared on the Thursday episode.

“I think we should make a pact that you and Cole [DeBoer] and I go to the sperm bank and we’ll get pregnant together at the time same,” the Hustle and Heart author declared. She then clarified that she will make a solo trip to the sperm bank, but wants Chelsea, 26, and husband Cole to get busy around the same time as her insemination.

“That would be cute,” said Kailyn. “You know how Snooki and JWoww did their little show on MTV. Ours could be about our pregnancy.”

The mom of three is serious about using a donor. “I already started looking at banks,” she revealed on the show. The MTV personality noted that all donors must have a minimum of a bachelor’s degree and that she’d look for “tall, dark and handsome. Maybe a PhD.”

While the reality star confirmed to Radar Online that she is thinking about “more kids, yes,” she added, “no more baby daddies! The sperm bank thing would be a different scenario because it wouldn’t be a involved.”

If Kailyn has another boy, she won’t need to buy any new baby clothes. She shares Issac, 8, with former boyfriend Jo Rivera; Lincoln, 4, with ex-husband Javi Marroquin; and Lux, 9 months, with ex Chris Lopez.

Chelsea, meanwhile, shares daughter Aubree, 8, with ex-boyfriend Adam Lind. The licensed aesthetician and Cole are parents of 16-month-old son Watson, and will welcome a baby girl in September!
title: Kailyn Lowry Wants Baby No. 4 and Is Looking at Sperm Banks
